author: Staff Reporter
text: The Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has provided Chennai-based Cancer Institute (WIA) with a world-class Health Management Information System TCS Med Mantra, which will enable the institution to offer state-of-the-art treatment to all sections of society. The gesture comes ahead of World Cancer Day. The TCS Med Mantra is an internet-based HMIS that leverages TCS’ Cloud Computing platform for anytime, anywhere access.
title: TCS gesture to Cancer Institute
